Description: Bosch Global Software Technologies Private Limited (BGSW) is a 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. We are one of the world’s leading global suppliers of technology and services, offering end-to-end Engineering, IT, and Business Solutions.With a global footprint and presence in US, Europe, Japan, China, and the Asia Pacific region, we are at the forefront of designing, developing, and executing IoT ecosystems through our all-encompassing capability within the 3 aspects of IoT – Sensors, Software, and Services.We have always focused on improving the quality of the life of people, providing newer revenue-generating opportunities, and improving operational efficiencies for enterprises through an array of solutions. With our unique ability to offer end-to-end solutions that connect Sensors, Software, and Services, we enable businesses to move from the traditional to digital, or improve businesses by introducing a digital element in their products and processes.Good programming skills in C and C++ languageExperience in multi-core architecture and toolsVehicle architecture experience will be an advantageExperience in software architecture development & creating detailed design using Enterprise Architect, Flux or equivalent toolExperience in AUTOSAR architecture and developmentExperience in communication protocols like CAN, Flex-ray and EthernetGood debugging skills - Lauterbach or IC5000Experience in modelling tools such as Matlab Stateflow will be an advantageBasic know how of Image processingExperience in tools like MKS or GiT, ALM or T&R, Vector tools like CANoe, CANapeVehicle application experience will be an advantageBE/Mtech ( Computer Science, Electronics & Electrical) with 8+ Yrs of  experienceHands on embedded software development is mandatoryJob Details
